parameter.name: rsid
parameter.description: Rsid that was returned in search request response

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: Pages to be returned, defaults to 0 which is the first page

parameter.name: format
parameter.description: Data format to be returned, Options are “raw”, “csv”, or “json”

parameter.name: columns
parameter.description: Comma separated list to limit result set to a list of fields
